mapper.select: select m1.id, m1.name, m1.path, m1.component, m1.icon, m1.menu_type as menuType, m1.perm, m1.parent_id as parentId, m2.name as parentName, m1.order_num as orderNum, m1.is_hidden as isHidden, m1.remark from menu m1 left join menu m2 on m2.id = m1.parent_id where m1.is_deleted = 0 and m2.is_deleted = 0 and m1.id = #{menuId}
select id from menu where is_deleted = 0 and menu_type = 'M' OR menu_type = 'C'
